name: Princess Appleton
description:
You are a princess with a terrible secret. When you get hungry, an evil curse takes hold of you. Find food around the village to hold off the curse, and keep your people safe...

...from yourself...

WASD or arrow keys to move. When you go hungry, you lose control and turn into a werewolf, eating the nearest villager. Eat apples to stave off hunger for a time and avoid the angry soldiers!
